html:
1.6.21  4:20 pm   In "the song song" you said you were trying to break free. Did you ever break free,

     and if so, when?

1.6.21  4:02 pm   You should really start dropping hints about your next video/song.

     I think that will really make a lot of people happy after what a year 2020 was. lol. Love your work!!!

1.6.21  3:36 pm   why are most of your videos uploaded on a tuesday,

     and why was Might Quit uploaded on a monday?
1.6.21  3:11 pm   what is the best range for pitch bend
1.6.21  2:50 pm   How can one avoid becoming frustrated with the world?

1.6.21  2:47 pm   did you ever have any self-esteem issues?,

     I've been struggling with self doubt and I'm always too harsh on myself. feeling like my work isn't good enough and that I could do better; generally just being dissatisfied with everything. Do you have any advice on how to deal with things as such?.
btw your content makes me happy (:

1.6.21  2:39 pm   how did you begin making videos like these?

     also just wanted to say your music helps me sleep at night, you're really creative and i was wondering how you started to make this kind of content?
1.6.21  2:24 pm   How do you make songs?
1.6.21  2:04 pm   In "might quit" are you saying you will quit school after the first day because it is overwhelming, or that you're quiting something else, such as your music, to focus on school?
1.6.21  1:46 pm   How do you exercise?

1.6.21  1:26 pm   You Predicted Covid-19 so well during Dec 25, 2018

      How?
1.6.21  12:50 pm   is it true that all music originates from the sun?
1.6.21  12:33 pm   Help I am lost in the hallway and cannot find room 220 I am beginning to doubt its existence what do i do
1.6.21  11:58 am   Hey bill do you have any advice on how to deal with anxiety?
1.6.21  10:48 am   When did you start learning music?
1.6.21  10:28 am   What type of chip flavor is best?
1.6.21  10:10 am   Do you want to build a house on mount st.hellen
1.6.21  9:16 am   what is your opinion on the geopolitical situation in the Northsouthern sea?

1.6.21  8:38 am   how do you end up writing the lyrics for your songs?

      they seem so random but so carefully considered, i would like to know your thought process for it. thanks!

1.6.21  8:31 am   Early sciences often defined the elements as being Water, Earth, Fire, and Air. Do you think that modern music can be divided into similar "cardinal" genres?

     If so, what do you think these genres are?
1.6.21  8:31 am   what's your philosophy in life?

1.6.21  8:28 am   Are there secret hidden codes in your answers that we need to look for,

     or do you just like messing with us?  

     If there are hidden codes, where should we look first?
1.6.21  8:19 am   Are you onto something
1.6.21  7:37 am   How can I learn the ability of being able to choose?
1.6.21  6:27 am   Have you ever tried to eat chairs?
1.6.21  6:20 am   What's your favorite thing about being you?
1.6.21  5:51 am   hi bill. what do i do if a piece of an original song pops up in my head and it's NOT the beginning? thnkas
1.6.21  4:00 am   what is your favourite song you have written
1.6.21  3:46 am   how do you feel when you are writing/proposing/editing your (music) videos?
1.6.21  3:39 am   How do you know so much, without even saying much?
1.6.21  2:21 am   Do you have any wisdom when it comes to sleeping good?

1.6.21  1:39 am   Hi! Does this question box thingie work? If so, I just wanted to tell you that I enjoy your work tremendously, and I really hope you are having a lovely start to the New Year. Hope you are doing well, and know that you have brought a stranger on the internet immense joy (:
1.6.21  12:07 am   do you think highly of yourself

1.5.21  11:59 pm   I love your bossa nova/ jazz style music. I noticed you have albums on bandcamp but I cannot listen to any of the songs to preview them. Which ones do you recommend for more of that specific style?

these

1.5.21  10:36 pm   If you don't know what "neon" means, as you mentioned in many answers before: a chemical element that is a gas with no smell or color, and shines red when an electric current goes through it. My question is, do you really don't know what neon is, or do you want to say that this word is used in a wrong context regarding your art style?
1.5.21  9:19 pm   What is your favorite genre of music?
1.5.21  8:17 pm   Why is it so cold in this church?
1.5.21  7:20 pm   What is the meaning of life and why does the universe exist? Chop chop, researchers around the world are waiting for you to answer
1.5.21  6:13 pm   Hello. I wanted to start learning music, is there any instrument you would recommend? Thank you if you decide to answer this
1.5.21  5:34 pm   what is your purpose of life or at least  what do you think it isfor you.
1.5.21  4:29 pm   what is the meaning of normal

1.5.21  3:23 pm   why do people say every social media app is garbage? i find that hard to believe. people say tiktok is garbage, twitter is garbage, reddit is garbage, youtube, etc... but with most of these places you can hide the stuff you don't wanna see. Like, if you only followed one twitter account that posted pictures of plants, and you LOVE plants, then your experience on twitter would be excellent. just venting i guess
1.5.21  2:19 pm   Do you dream of puppies just like mount St. Helens?

1.5.21  1:08 pm   you are smarter than i realized. i like your songs. they are very good. also, can you explain why the birds are made of trees? because i am pretty sure that you haven't explained this. also, because they are birds, why do they have to fly on an airplane, can't fly by themselves? or maybe its because they are made of trees. maybe that makes them heavier. (please respond to this) (also thanks if you do)

1.5.21  12:43 pm   Is there actually a meaning in your music?

      Or is it all just completely random?
1.5.21  11:13 am   Will you ever explain why/how birds are made of trees? Because you said you did, but that must have been in an alternate reality or something.
